favourite.article: Amen for the all inclusive Spirit! He is wonderful!
How wonderful! The Father is in us!

My husband and I enjoyed this song very much! We sing it again and again! Our fathers already passed away. But we have an everlasting Father. He is all-inclusive. He lives inside of us. He is wonderful!
This is such a comforting song!
What He is? He is everything to us. He is all inclusive. Praise the Lord.

Praise the Lord! He is everything to us. He is the reality of everything we need. And He is living now inside of us. What a wonderful fact! We can experience Him and enjoy Him every where and every moment in our life.

He's so wonderful! Praise the Lord for He is all-inclusive! Now He is so accessible to us! We only have to call upon His name and enjoy this Wonderful God! "O Lord Jesus! Thank you for being everything!"
